title: Top Floor Remodeled NOPA 1bd w/ HW Floors! Great Location! ~ J.Wavro
map_address: Broderick Street near Golden Gate Avenue
posting_body: San Francisco - Alamo Square/NOPA - Apartment for rent
Top Floor Remodeled NOPA 1bd w/ HW Floors!
This remodeled apartment is located in trendy NOPA/Alamo Square.
A Walkers Paradise - you will love grabbing breakfast at Brenda's or Eddie's Cafe, grocery shopping at Bi-Right or heading to the Divisadero Farmers Market!
Alamo Square Park is only a few blocks away.
Conveniently located near the Shuttle stops.
~  Top floor apartment in a small 3 story walk-up building
~  Remodeled kitchen with stainless steel appliances featuring a gas stove
~  Large living room with French Doors that open to the bedroom
~  Remodeled bath with vanity sink and shower/tub combo
~  No laundry on site - laundromat nearby
Service or support animals which are necessary due to disability will be allowed.
Broderick Street & Golden Gate Avenue, San Francisco, California

This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.
